biased.translation[0].definitions[0].def: unfairly preferring one person or group over another
biased.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Of course I’m biased, but I thought my daughter’s paintings were the best.
news reporting that was heavily biased towards the government
biased.translation[0].definitions[1].def: more interested in a particular thing than in another
biased.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The majority of infants are biased towards being social rather than being antisocial.
